name: Virtual Disaster
description:
Virtual Disaster is a game in which you play as a giant that watches over and protects a city from destruction. Disasters will strike in increasingly difficult waves of unfortunate events, including:

  • Meteors - Defend with baseball bats
  • Buildings on fire - Extinguish with rain clouds
  • Zombie attack - Fry with a magnifying glass or two
  • Alien invasion - Catch and throw flying saucers

How long will your city survive?

* Virtual Disaster has been developed primarily for the Quest and will be available soon through App Lab. This is for the PCVR version, currently only tested on Quest + Link. Should work well with any Oculus headsets. Support for other versions coming soon.

** We intend to plant a tree through #TEAMTREES for every donation over $5, and two trees for every additional $5 ($10 = 3 trees, $15 = 5 trees, etc). Basically if you want to give us money but hate the environment donate < $5. If you want to plant trees but not give us money go to teamtrees.org. We do not have any official affiliation with Team Trees.
